title: How to unsubscribe from Empik Premium
description: Learn how to cancel your Empik Premium subscription. You can cancel via email, phone, contact form, or in person if purchased in-store.

web.title: Unsubscribe via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Empik Premium subscription via the website:

*   Go to the Empik website.
*   Use the contact form on the Empik portal to submit a cancellation request.

email.title: Unsubscribe via Email
email.description:
To cancel your Empik Premium subscription via email:

*   Send an email to obsluga.klienta@empik.com requesting cancellation.

phone.title: Unsubscribe via Phone
phone.description:
To cancel your Empik Premium subscription via phone:

*   Call the customer service line at +48 22 462 72 50.

in_person.title: Unsubscribe In-Person
in_person.description:
To cancel your Empik Premium subscription in person:

*   If you purchased Empik Premium in an Empik store, go to any Empik store.
*   Request a refund at the store.

seo_text: Cancel your Empik Premium subscription quickly and easily. Follow our guide to unsubscribe via email, phone, online form, or in-store.
